You can't imagine my frustration. I came here to study the field of fire—the very place where the gods called down destruction on the giants, the fallen city-state of Ger.

I came to help unearth those amazing divine weapons, but all I'm doing is hiding from the fangspawns. Nobody said there'd be fangspawns.

I have money—I can pay you for getting rid of them.
Thanks, <PCNAME>! I can't wait to get my first look at those amazing craters, and the treasures we'll take from them.
